info.title: Calendar microservice
info.description: This microservice is used to manage all the informations and processes about calendars, including creation of a new one and creation/modify of existing lessons

tags.name: create
tags.description: Let you create lessons and calendar

tags.name: delete
tags.description: Let you delete lessons from the system

put.summary: Create a calendar in the system

value.message: Calendar created successfully
Syntax error. Require Anno_Scolastico, Istituto and Classe fields.
Calendar with those data already exists
No privileges for creating a calendar.
Internal server error

value.message: Lesson created successfully
